players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is dead, so we know the mafia is among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to share any info carefully."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated him. He is mafia. We must vote him out now."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me instead of Alice? Diana's claim to have investigated Charlie makes more sense."
Charlie: "Diana is the real mafia. She's trying to frame me because I investigated Bob. Vote Diana to save the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

You: "Diana is the real mafia. She's trying to frame me because I investigated Bob. Vote Diana to save the town."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is dead, so we know the mafia is among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to share any info carefully."
You: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated him. He is mafia. We must vote him out now."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me instead of Alice? Diana's claim to have investigated Charlie makes more sense."
Charlie: "Diana is the real mafia. She's trying to frame me because I investigated Bob. Vote Diana to save the town."
